author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Tests were failing in CI nightly build as the timing was off past 1050ms (was actually 1053ms).  Adding a slightly bigger window.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @daxian-dbw can we merge this as it's affecting several of the CI runs

title: Travis-CI nightly build failing due to start-sleep tests
